title: What companies specialize in contact center technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Contact Centers are built using combination of different functions and technologies like - Automatic Call Distribution (ACD), Proactive/Predictive Dialer, Interactive Voice Response (IVR) , Recording, etc. Key companies providing Contact Center products and solutions are - Avaya Technologies, Genesys technology, Nortel, Cosmocom, etc.
